bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with shao yin bing 少陰病 , minor yin disease. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry gan cao 甘草 quoting Shang han lun 傷寒論 311: 少陰病二三日，咽痛者，可與甘草湯 , “When a minor yin disease has lasted for two to three days with the [patient’s] throat aching, one can give the decoction with gan cao ”, writes: 傷寒咽痛：少陰證，甘草湯主 之 , “ Minor yin pathological condition : the decoction with gan cao controls it”. Shao yin shang han 少陰傷寒 , harm in the minor yin section caused by cold [1] Alternative Names shang hang shao yin zheng 傷寒少陰證， harm caused by cold with signs in the minor yin section. Pathological Condition of shang han 傷寒 , harm caused by cold, with signs such as a minute, fine movement in the vessels, and a desire to sleep. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 8 Recipe Entry da yan mi tang 大岩蜜 湯 , massive cliff honey decoction: 並主少陰傷寒 , “It also controls harm in the minor yin section caused by cold ”.
